title: Discount deals: Tata cars drop prices by up to Rs 60,000; Tiago, Altroz, Nexon, and more on sale now
description: As the sun shines brighter and temperatures soar, Tata Motors is ushering in the summer season with irresistible discount deals on some of its most sought-after car models. For those contemplating a Tata vehicle purchase this month, the timing couldn't be more perfect â€“ substantial savings await on popular models including the Tiago, Altroz, Nexon, Harrier, and Safari.
